import CheckoutSteps from "../components/CheckoutSteps"; import {useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {Link, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import {addToCart} from "../action/cartActions"; export default function PlaceOrderScreen(){ const navigate = useNavigate() const cart = useSelector((state) => state.cart) if(!cart.paymentMethod){ navigate('/payment') } return(

  • Shipping

    Name:{cart.shippingAddress.fullName} Address:{cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode}, {cart.shippingAddress.country}

  • Payment

    PaymentMethod:{cart.paymentMethod}

  • Order

      {cart.cartItems.map((item) => (
    • {item.name}
      {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price}
      • ))}
) }
